ygData.subject: Re: Staff of the Wheel
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zone in at the dead side and yell for someone to guide you. The hand s spawns are well timed so  if it s camped, you re ok. You also will need invis vs.
ygData.messageBody:
Alan Charity wrote:
>
> From: "Alan Charity" <acharity@...>
>
> I have started my quest for the Staff of the Wheel and currently have 8 of
> the 10 rods.
>
> I am missing the one in Guk and the one from the Everfrost caves. But I have
> a few questions since I have spent no time in Guk in 32 levels.
>
> GUK
> 1. I need to know the easiest or quickest path to the hand room?
>

Zone in at the dead side and yell for someone to guide you. The hand's
spawns are well timed so if it's camped, you're ok. You also will need
invis vs. undead and the bedroom to be camped (vampiric bats see through
both invis). BTW, the hand is not undead so she will see through invis
undead. And you CAN'T stack both. So if the hand spawns and you're
there, don't even think about anything, you're dead 100%. Just try to
grab the rod before you die so you'll drag your corpse with the rod.

> 2. Is the room on the Live or Dead side?
>
> 3. Will I encounter any Undead frogs along the way?
>

Hehehe. Yes.

> EVERFROST
> I know that the rod is surrounded by 3 IBS and that an NPC is in the area. I
> can get by the IBS with Invis to Undead but the NPC could be a problem.
>

This was really easy. Nothing there can see through invis except the
IBS' who are all too green to attack anyway.

> 1. Is this NPC within range of the rod?
>
> I will not have a group with me and am only going to attempt this when the
> Hand room is being camped. I may however try a suicide run depending on how
> brave I feel.
>

Any suicide run through Guk will only end in death. There is 0 chance of
you just running through since the place has a lot of spellcasters, and
many are on your way to the hand room. Most of them are inside.

--
Sergey

Worker bees can leave
Even drones can fly away
The queen is their slave
